statements: SELECT * FROM returns_and_exchanges;
SELECT issue_description, return_date FROM returns_and_exchanges;
SELECT id, resolution FROM returns_and_exchanges ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM returns_and_exchanges WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, return_date, resolution FROM returns_and_exchanges WHERE return_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM returns_and_exchanges WHERE resolution = 'Refunded' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT id, issue_description FROM returns_and_exchanges WHERE return_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT id, issue_description, return_date FROM returns_and_exchanges WHERE issue_description LIKE '%damaged%' OR issue_description LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM returns_and_exchanges WHERE resolution = 'Returned';
SELECT * FROM returns_and_exchanges WHERE issue_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY return_date DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_description FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Example Product';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%wrong%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM product_returns;
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM product_returns WHERE return_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT product_id, return_reason, return_date FROM product_returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT exchange_id, product_id, exchange_reason FROM exchange_requests ORDER BY exchange_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_actions WHERE action_type = 'refund' ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_returns;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM product_returns WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, exchange_reason FROM exchange_requests WHERE exchange_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY exchange_date DESC;
SELECT action_id, return_id, action_type FROM return_actions WHERE action_type = 'refund';
SELECT return_id, action_type, action_date FROM return_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC, action_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnIssues;
SELECT product_name, issue_description FROM ExchangeIssues WHERE status='Resolved';
SELECT issue_id, product_name FROM ExchangeIssues WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, status FROM ReturnIssues WHERE status='Open' ORDER BY issue_id ASC;
SELECT resolution_id, issue_id, resolution_info FROM ExchangeResolution WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ReturnIssues ORDER BY issue_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, issue_description FROM ExchangeIssues WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT issue_id, issue_description, status FROM ReturnIssues WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY issue_id
SELECT r.issue_id, r.issue_description, er.resolution_info FROM ReturnIssues r JOIN ExchangeResolution er ON r.issue_id = er.issue_id
SELECT rr.resolution_id, rr.resolution_info, er.issue_id FROM ReturnResolution rr LEFT JOIN ExchangeResolution er ON rr.issue_id = er.issue_id
SELECT * FROM ProductReturns;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM ProductReturns WHERE return_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_id, COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM ReturnStatus GROUP BY return_id ORDER BY total_returns DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, exchange_reason, exchange_date FROM ProductExchanges WHERE exchange_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductReturns;
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM ProductReturns WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT exchange_id, product_name, exchange_reason FROM ProductExchanges ORDER BY exchange_date DESC;
SELECT status_id, status_description FROM ReturnStatus JOIN ProductReturns ON ReturnStatus.return_id = ProductReturns.return_id;
SELECT log_id, log_description, log_date FROM ReturnLogs WHERE log_description LIKE '%error%';
